Bibliographic References: PP, no. 327, pi. 34 d; PPSupp, no. 437; Ant Surv III/2Non Sepcified3, p. 243, fig. 23; Moret, Ilioupersis, pi. 28,2, p. 64.
Imagery Description: (a) Youth, wearing petasos, with drawn sword threatening woman, draped in black, seated on plinth of Ionic tomb monument (Neoptolemos and Polyxena ?) (b) two draped youths, with a large window above between them.
